attributes.action: erect a life-size statue of Enoch Powell in every city, town and village centre in the land.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Since 7/7 confirmed his status as a prophet Enoch Powell is the one and only politician of this country who we know was speaking the absolute truth.  He has the right to stand in every corner of this country as a warning to the indigenous population to guard against the current policy of uncontrolled, unencumbered immigration of anybody and everybody from wherever in the world to this country.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
